channel.title: Using school shootings as names
channel.description:
Now, at the start of the game, I saw the names and while they appalled me, I didnt think much of it. That is until our #2 started making awful remarks to our number 7, whose name was Colombine. What he said sent me into an instant rage. Maybe I am off my rocker here, but after what happened in Florida, USA last week has sensitivity levels a little high. And to sit in your video game and have to watch people make fun of these shootings like this disgusts me. I understand there is to be done while they are acting like this, but I think it goes without saying that these 3 people should be perma banned period. Thoughts?
![tol|690x387](upload://7ogfXJJgw6fvsLhyhmMWJOYFsC6.jpg)

can this conversation continue or not is pretty much my question. For this specific topic or future reference

also

Weizen1988:

This conversation is over.

item.title: Using school shootings as names
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Just because it hasn’t become uncivil and full of insults yet doesn’t mean that it won’t. Nothing good can come of continuing this. Future discussion of this won’t lead to anything meaningful.

The devs have spoken about it. And joking about things like this is clearly and obviously not okay, so there isn’t really any room for discussion.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Using school shootings as names
item.dc:creator: Melody
item.description:
Now I understand that rules are rules whatever mods or any higher have a say and I do agree to a certain extent but are we not able to have discussion about or “debate” on it here?

Honestly I don’t know I checked the rules and the only thing that could possibly deny the most is probably rule 20.

“Leave your salt at home - no drama, no fueling the fire – just ignore bickering.”

But like, the discussion is in a sense still very much civil
and again I understand the mod have already said “School shooter” = Ban, so you could say thats the end of it but I’m interested in the conversation and Peter and Bread could possibly want to continue discussing, is it a problem to continue this thread?

can this conversation continue or not is pretty much my question. For this specific topic or future reference

Read full topic

item.title: Using school shootings as names
item.dc:creator: Weizen1988
item.description:
This conversation is over. People will no longer name themselves such things, those who do will be punished, I do not care if they think its funny or appropriate, we don’t. This is a game.

From the discord News channel.
i42-Xblade - Yesterday at 7:48 PM
Folks that are naming themselves school shooter names are going to find themselves suspended for 3x longer starting now~ it’s not funny, just don’t do it. :banhammer:

Read full topic

item.title: Using school shootings as names

item.description:
Reports will be dealt with guys. The fact that several people chose to name themselves this is particularly sad and I hope that those who choose to do this will think more thoroughly about it in the future

Read full topic

item.title: Using school shootings as names
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Peter_Parker:

but I think an open discussion is ok as long as it is kept in line.

Clearly it’s incapable of being “kept in line.” Let’s just drop this and let the moderators handle the reports.

Ami:

Please get off your high horse. It’s like you speak for all victims of a crime or situation. You don’t so please get off it

Noz pls. You should know better than to try to shame someone for trying to do the right thing. Making this forum post was unnecessary and the reports should have been done privately, but still.

Read full topic

item.title: Using school shootings as names
item.dc:creator: Peter_Parker
item.description:
Your literally making jokes about dead children…It;s obvious you just don’t get it, and will never get it. Seek help, and during your ban, dig deep into that moral compass of yours and truly decide if poking fun at dead children is the kind of example you want to set. Nothing funny about school shootings. Period.

Read full topic
